AI Description: Py-kiwisolver is a fast and efficient C library for solving linear programming problems. It provides an interface to the Kiwi library, which is a constraint solver that can be used for various optimization tasks.
Core Features:
1. Solves linear programming problems efficiently.
2. Provides an interface to the Kiwi constraint solver library.
3. Supports various optimization tasks.
4. Fast and reliable performance.
